doc.field: Evan A. Davis records on the U.S. House of Representatives Committee on the Judiciary Impeachment Inquiry
Evan A. Davis records on the U.S. House of Representatives Committee on the Judiciary Impeachment Inquiry

"Transcript prepared by the Impeachment Inquiry Staff for the House Judiciary Committee of a recording of a meeting among the President [Richard Nixon], John Dean, John Ehrlichman, H.R. Haldeman and John Mitchell on March 22, 1973, from 1:57 to 3:43 P.M."
